creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: standing woman in profile from PL, wearing a white sleeveless dress with predominately black, green and red patterned band at bottom, with black triangles and red diamonds; woman wears white leggings and moccasins with black, red and white fringed elements around ankles; woman also wears blue beaded necklaces, with feathers on her upper back and holds a bouquet with white flowers, green foliage and feathers; woman has long black hair
signed: LRC, in black: Quah Ah. / Tonita Peña.
title: Buffalo Maiden
